news.title: Reeves disappointed after economy unexpectedly shrinks
news.summary: The economy contracted in May for the second month in a row, adding to pressure on the chancellor.

news.title: UK-France migrant deal 'robust' against legal challenges, Cooper says
news.summary: The home secretary says the government will resist any attempts to block the deal agreed with France this week.

news.title: Chris Mason: Starmer and Macron plead for patience in an impatient world
news.summary: The UK and France have agreed a "one in, one out" deal for migrants crossing the Channel.

news.title: Plans for cash Isa changes on hold after backlash
news.summary: There had been reports in recent weeks that the chancellor was going to cut the Â£20,000 limit.

news.title: 'We have a hosepipe ban but water leaking down our streets'
news.summary: Yorkshire Water customers say they understand a ban but question the firm's efforts to fix leaks.

news.title: Trump threatens 35% tariffs on Canadian goods
news.summary: Trump has threatened blanket levies of 15% or 20% on most trade partners, and says he will soon announce new tariffs on the EU.

news.title: Delays and shortages in UK's F-35 jet fleet, watchdog says
news.summary: Delays and personnel shortages are "undermining the armed forces' warfighting capability", a report says.

news.title: TV doctor and IVF pioneer Robert Winston quits BMA over strikes
news.summary: The Labour peer says the strikes could damage public trust in doctors.

news.title: The Papers: 'One in, one doubt' and 'sick note' crackdown
news.summary: Reaction to the UK-France agreement tackling migrant Channel crossings dominates the front pages.

news.title: Officers who confronted Southport killer honoured
news.summary: Three police officers who faced down Axel Rudakubana are commended for their bravery.
